https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ty24e7wl54VHP6sE0YS0UyS3JjI.jpg An introduction to the work of some of the foremost Black visual artists working today, inspired by the late David Driskell's landmark 1976 exhibition, "Two Centuries of Black American Art." Black Art: In the Absence of Light
